# Audio File Stream Flags

**API Collection**

Flags set by the property listener callback and the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamParseBytes(_:_:_:_:)] function.

## Constants

- **propertyIsCached**: This flag is set when the callback [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStream_PropertyListenerProc] is invoked in the case that the value of the property has been cached and can be obtained later.
- **cacheProperty**: A property listener sets this flag to instruct the parser to cache the property value so that it remains available after the callback returns.
- **discontinuity**: Pass this flag to the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamParseBytes(_:_:_:_:)] function to signal a discontinuity in the audio data.
- **offsetIsEstimated**: This flag is returned by the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamSeek(_:_:_:_:)] function if the byte offset is only an estimate.

## Constants

- **Audio File Stream Properties**: Audio file stream properties contain information that you can use to help interpret the audio data in a stream.
